author: By COLLEEN LONG, DAVID RISING and EMILY SCHMALL Associated Press
title: US cases now most in world, US capital sees more infections
description: The United States's caseload of coronavirus infections surged to the most in the world and its capital reported more infections as Italy shut most of its industry and masses of Indian day laborers received food rations after a lockdown put…
content:
The United States's caseload of coronavirus infections surged to the most in the world and its capital reported more infections as Italy shut most of its industry and masses of Indian day laborers received food rations after a lockdown put them out of work.
